news.title: Talking Heads to Release New Rarities Compilation on Record Store Day Black Friday
news.summary: Tentative Decisions gathers early demos and live recordings of songs that eventually appeared on the bandâ€™s first two albums

news.title: Warner Joins Forces With AI Song Generator, Suno, That It Was Suing
news.summary: After accusing Suno of illegally training artificial intelligence on its artists, Warner Music Group has made a licensing deal with the company that includes handing it control of Songkick

news.title: Oneohtrix Point Never Announces European Tour Dates for Spring 2026
news.summary: Daniel Lopatin will support the new album Tranquilizer with shows in the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, England, and Switzerland
